title: TDC deadlines extension announced
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306223148/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 3.Jan.2008 5.28pm 

The TDC deadlines for TDC54 (typographic design) and TDC22008  
(typeface design) have been extended to Friday 11 January 2008.

Entries need to be in New York by that date.  
Type designs can be PDF’d and uploaded using the TDC competition  
registration forms at

which can also be used to register for the TDC54 competition  
(physical entries are required, though).

Competition rules and guidelines can be found at

Happy New Year, good luck and thank you!

—  
Gary Munch  
Postmaster, Webmaster, Chairman  
Type Directors Club
author: Miss Tiffany
